page.title: 13OTHER SERVICES
page.content:
LIBRARY SERVICE A{mobile library}comes to the village once a fortnight, on Tuesdays. The stock of books it carries is limited, but any book may be ordered from the Librarian. It is quite common for books to arrive more quickly when ordered from the Library van than when ordered from the main Library in Wick.
REFUSE COLLECTION The bin men come on Tuesday mornings. They don't always follow the same route around the village. Having the wind blowing on their backs ensures that ashes caught by the wind are not blown into the men's faces.
OTHER SERVICES A coal merchant visits the area each week, as does a lemonade lorry.Sunday newspapers are brought round by a car.
